documentation.text:
@dev Emitted when new NFT-collateralized loan is created with id `id` 
 `sender`

@dev Emitted when amount is withdrawn from the latest bid of loan with
 id `id`
@dev Emitted when loan with id `id` is repaid by `sender`
@dev Emitted when loan with id `id` is cancelled by its owner

@dev Emitted when loan with id `id` is underwritten by
 `sender`

@dev Emitted when loan with id `id` is seized by
 `seizer`

@dev Emitted when loan with id `id` is defunded by
 `sender`

@dev Create a new NFT-collateralized loan with NFT id `id` 
 and NFT contract address of `contractAddress`. Interest rate and
 maximum amount to be taken as loan is fixed 
 Returns the id of the newly created loan
 Emits a {Created} event.

@dev Allows anyone to repay the loan with id `id`
 NOTE: This function can be executed by the owner of the NFT 
 or by any user after the timeframe of 1 hour after the loan was
 terminated.
 IMPORTANT: NFT will be transaferd to the user repaying the loan
 Emits a {Repaid} event.

@dev Allows anyone to seize the loan with id `id`
 Emits a {Seized} event.

@dev Emitted when new NFT-collateralized loan is created with id `id` 
 `sender`

@dev Emitted when amount is withdrawn from the latest bid of loan with
 id `id`
@dev Emitted when loan with id `id` is repaid by `sender`
@dev Emitted when loan with id `id` is cancelled by its owner

@dev Emitted when loan with id `id` is underwritten by
 `sender`

@dev Emitted when loan with id `id` is seized by
 `seizer`

@dev Emitted when loan with id `id` is defunded by
 `sender`

@dev Create a new NFT-collateralized loan with NFT id `id` 
 and NFT contract address of `contractAddress`. Interest rate and
 maximum amount to be taken as loan is fixed 
 Returns the id of the newly created loan
 Emits a {Created} event.

@dev Allows anyone to repay the loan with id `id`
 NOTE: This function can be executed by the owner of the NFT 
 or by any user after the timeframe of 1 hour after the loan was
 terminated.
 IMPORTANT: NFT will be transaferd to the user repaying the loan
 Emits a {Repaid} event.

@dev Allows anyone to seize the loan with id `id`
 Emits a {Seized} event.

Cancelled(uint256).details: Emitted when loan with id `id` is cancelled by its owner

Created(uint256,address).details: Emitted when new NFT-collateralized loan is created with id `id`  `sender`

Drawn(uint256).details: Emitted when amount is withdrawn from the latest bid of loan with id `id`

Registered(address,bytes32).details: Emitted when loan with id `id` is defunded by `sender`

Repaid(uint256,address).details: Emitted when loan with id `id` is repaid by `sender`

Seized(uint256,address).details: Emitted when loan with id `id` is seized by `seizer`

Underwritten(uint256,address,uint256).details: Emitted when loan with id `id` is underwritten by `sender`

cancelLoan(uint256).details: Allows the owner of the NFT to cancel the loan with id `id` NOTE: This function can be executed only if there are no bids Emits a {Cancelled} event.

createLoan(uint256,address,uint256,uint2.details: Create a new NFT-collateralized loan with NFT id `id`  and NFT contract address of `contractAddress`. Interest rate and maximum amount to be taken as loan is fixed  Returns the id of the newly created loan Emits a {Created} event.

drawLoan(uint256,uint256).details: amount `amount` is withdrawn from the latest bid of loan with id `id` by the owner of the NFT Emits a {Drawn} event.

repayLoan(uint256).details: Allows anyone to repay the loan with id `id` NOTE: This function can be executed by the owner of the NFT  or by any user after the timeframe of 1 hour after the loan was terminated. IMPORTANT: NFT will be transaferd to the user repaying the loan Emits a {Repaid} event.

seizeLoan(uint256).details: Allows anyone to seize the loan with id `id` Emits a {Seized} event.

underWriteLoan(uint256).details: Allows the bidders to underwrite the top bids on the loan with id `id` Emits a {Underwritten} event.
